00021   // statements
00022   void Inspect::operator()(Block* block)
00023   {
00024     if (!block->is_root()) {
00025       add_open_mapping(block);
00026       append_scope_opener();
00027     }
00028     if (output_style() == NESTED) indentation += block->tabs();
00029     for (size_t i = 0, L = block->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00030       (*block)[i]->perform(this);
00031     }
00032     if (output_style() == NESTED) indentation -= block->tabs();
00033     if (!block->is_root()) {
00034       append_scope_closer();
00035       add_close_mapping(block);
00036     }
00037 
00038   }

00097   void Inspect::operator()(At_Rule* at_rule)
00098   {
00099     append_indentation();
00100     append_token(at_rule->keyword(), at_rule);
00101     if (at_rule->selector()) {
00102       append_mandatory_space();
00103       bool was_wrapped = in_wrapped;
00104       in_wrapped = true;
00105       at_rule->selector()->perform(this);
00106       in_wrapped = was_wrapped;
00107     }
00108     if (at_rule->block()) {
00109       at_rule->block()->perform(this);
00110     }
00111     else {
00112       append_delimiter();
00113     }
00114   }

00116   void Inspect::operator()(Declaration* dec)
00117   {
00118     if (dec->value()->concrete_type() == Expression::NULL_VAL) return;
00119     bool was_decl = in_declaration;
00120     in_declaration = true;
00121     if (output_style() == NESTED)
00122       indentation += dec->tabs();
00123     append_indentation();
00124     dec->property()->perform(this);
00125     append_colon_separator();
00126     dec->value()->perform(this);
00127     if (dec->is_important()) {
00128       append_optional_space();
00129       append_string("!important");
00130     }
00131     append_delimiter();
00132     if (output_style() == NESTED)
00133       indentation -= dec->tabs();
00134     in_declaration = was_decl;
00135   }

00138   {
00139     append_token(assn->variable(), assn);
00140     append_colon_separator();
00141     assn->value()->perform(this);
00142     if (assn->is_default()) {
00143       append_optional_space();
00144       append_string("!default");
00145     }
00146     append_delimiter();
00147   }

00149   void Inspect::operator()(Import* import)
00150   {
00151     if (!import->urls().empty()) {
00152       append_token("@import", import);
00153       append_mandatory_space();
00154 
00155       if (String_Quoted* strq = dynamic_cast<String_Quoted*>(import->urls().front())) {
00156         strq->is_delayed(false);
00157       }
00158 
00159       import->urls().front()->perform(this);
00160       append_delimiter();
00161       for (size_t i = 1, S = import->urls().size(); i < S; ++i) {
00162         append_mandatory_linefeed();
00163         append_token("@import", import);
00164         append_mandatory_space();
00165 
00166         if (String_Quoted* strq = dynamic_cast<String_Quoted*>(import->urls()[i])) {
00167           strq->is_delayed(false);
00168         }
00169 
00170         import->urls()[i]->perform(this);
00171         append_delimiter();
00172       }
00173     }
00174   }

00258     loop->list()->perform(this);

00289   void Inspect::operator()(Definition* def)
00290   {
00291     append_indentation();
00292     if (def->type() == Definition::MIXIN) {
00293       append_token("@mixin", def);
00294       append_mandatory_space();
00295     } else {
00296       append_token("@function", def);
00297       append_mandatory_space();
00298     }
00299     append_string(def->name());
00300     def->parameters()->perform(this);
00301     def->block()->perform(this);
00302   }

00311       call->arguments()->perform(this);
00312     }
00313     if (call->block()) {
00314       append_optional_space();

00327   void Inspect::operator()(Map* map)
00328   {
00329     if (map->empty()) return;
00330     if (map->is_invisible()) return;
00331     bool items_output = false;
00332     append_string("(");
00333     for (auto key : map->keys()) {
00334       if (key->is_invisible()) continue;
00335       if (map->at(key)->is_invisible()) continue;
00336       if (items_output) append_comma_separator();
00337       key->perform(this);
00338       append_colon_separator();
00339       map->at(key)->perform(this);
00340       items_output = true;
00341     }
00342     append_string(")");
00343   }
00344 
00345   void Inspect::operator()(List* list)
00346   {
00347     string sep(list->separator() == List::SPACE ? " " : ",");
00348     if (output_style() != COMPRESSED && sep == ",") sep += " ";
00349     else if (in_media_block && sep != " ") sep += " "; // verified
00350     if (list->empty()) return;
00351     bool items_output = false;
00352 
00353     bool was_space_array = in_space_array;
00354     bool was_comma_array = in_comma_array;
00355     if (!in_declaration && (
00356         (list->separator() == List::SPACE && in_space_array) ||
00357         (list->separator() == List::COMMA && in_comma_array)
00358     )) {
00359       append_string("(");
00360     }
00361 
00362     if (list->separator() == List::SPACE) in_space_array = true;
00363     else if (list->separator() == List::COMMA) in_comma_array = true;
00364 
00365     for (size_t i = 0, L = list->size(); i < L; ++i) {
00366       Expression* list_item = (*list)[i];
00367       if (list_item->is_invisible()) {
00368         continue;
00369       }
00370       if (items_output) {
00371         append_string(sep);
00372       }
00373       if (items_output && sep != " ")
00374         append_optional_space();
00375       list_item->perform(this);
00376       items_output = true;
00377     }
00378 
00379     in_comma_array = was_comma_array;
00380     in_space_array = was_space_array;
00381     if (!in_declaration && (
00382         (list->separator() == List::SPACE && in_space_array) ||
00383         (list->separator() == List::COMMA && in_comma_array)
00384     )) {
00385       append_string(")");
00386     }
00387 
00388   }
00389 
00390   void Inspect::operator()(Binary_Expression* expr)
00391   {
00392     expr->left()->perform(this);
00393     switch (expr->type()) {
00394       case Binary_Expression::AND: append_string(" and "); break;
00395       case Binary_Expression::OR:  append_string(" or ");  break;
00396       case Binary_Expression::EQ:  append_string(" == ");  break;
00397       case Binary_Expression::NEQ: append_string(" != ");  break;
00398       case Binary_Expression::GT:  append_string(" > ");   break;
00399       case Binary_Expression::GTE: append_string(" >= ");  break;
00400       case Binary_Expression::LT:  append_string(" < ");   break;
00401       case Binary_Expression::LTE: append_string(" <= ");  break;
00402       case Binary_Expression::ADD: append_string(" + ");   break;
00403       case Binary_Expression::SUB: append_string(" - ");   break;
00404       case Binary_Expression::MUL: append_string(" * ");   break;
00405       case Binary_Expression::DIV: append_string("/");     break;
00406       case Binary_Expression::MOD: append_string(" % ");   break;
00407       default: break; // shouldn't get here
00408     }
00409     expr->right()->perform(this);
00410   }

00412   void Inspect::operator()(Unary_Expression* expr)
00413   {
00414     if (expr->type() == Unary_Expression::PLUS) append_string("+");
00415     else                                        append_string("-");
00416     expr->operand()->perform(this);
00417   }

00441   void Inspect::operator()(Number* n)
00442   {
00443 
00444     string res;
00445 
00446     // init stuff
00447     n->normalize();
00448     int precision = 5;
00449     double value = n->value();
00450     // get option from optional context
00451     if (ctx) precision = ctx->precision;
00452 
00453     // check if the fractional part of the value equals to zero
00454     // neat trick from http://stackoverflow.com/a/1521682/1550314
00455     // double int_part; bool is_int = modf(value, &int_part) == 0.0;
00456 
00457     // this all cannot be done with one run only, since fixed
00458     // output differs from normal output and regular output
00459     // can contain scientific notation which we do not want!
00460 
00461     // first sample
00462     stringstream ss;
00463     ss.precision(12);
00464     ss << value;
00465 
00466     // check if we got scientific notation in result
00467     if (ss.str().find_first_of("e") != string::npos) {
00468       ss.clear(); ss.str(string());
00469       ss.precision(max(12, precision));
00470       ss << fixed << value;
00471     }
00472 
00473     string tmp = ss.str();
00474     size_t pos_point = tmp.find_first_of(".,");
00475     size_t pos_fract = tmp.find_last_not_of("0");
00476     bool is_int = pos_point == pos_fract ||
00477                   pos_point == string::npos;
00478 
00479     // reset stream for another run
00480     ss.clear(); ss.str(string());
00481 
00482     // take a shortcut for integers
00483     if (is_int)
00484     {
00485       ss.precision(0);
00486       ss << fixed << value;
00487       res = string(ss.str());
00488     }
00489     // process floats
00490     else
00491     {
00492       // do we have have too much precision?
00493       if (pos_fract < precision + pos_point)
00494       { precision = pos_fract - pos_point; }
00495       // round value again
00496       ss.precision(precision);
00497       ss << fixed << value;
00498       res = string(ss.str());
00499       // maybe we truncated up to decimal point
00500       size_t pos = res.find_last_not_of("0");
00501       bool at_dec_point = res[pos] == '.' ||
00502                           res[pos] == ',';
00503       // don't leave a blank point
00504       if (at_dec_point) ++ pos;
00505       res.resize (pos + 1);
00506     }
00507 
00508     // some final cosmetics
00509     if (res == "-0.0") res.erase(0, 1);
00510     else if (res == "-0") res.erase(0, 1);
00511 
00512     // add unit now
00513     res += n->unit();
00514 
00515     // check for a valid unit here
00516     // includes result for reporting
00517     if (n->numerator_units().size() > 1 ||
00518         n->denominator_units().size() > 0 ||
00519         (n->numerator_units().size() && n->numerator_units()[0].find_first_of('/') != string::npos) ||
00520         (n->numerator_units().size() && n->numerator_units()[0].find_first_of('*') != string::npos)
00521     ) {
00522       error(res + " isn't a valid CSS value.", n->pstate());
00523     }
00524 
00525     // output the final token
00526     append_token(res, n);
00527 
00528   }
00529 
00530   // helper function for serializing colors
00531   template <size_t range>
00532   static double cap_channel(double c) {
00533     if      (c > range) return range;
00534     else if (c < 0)     return 0;
00535     else                return c;
00536   }
00537 
00538   void Inspect::operator()(Color* c)
00539   {
00540     stringstream ss;
00541 
00542     // check if we prefer short hex colors
00543     bool want_short = output_style() == COMPRESSED;
00544 
00545     // original color name
00546     // maybe an unknown token
00547     string name = c->disp();
00548 
00549     // resolved color
00550     string res_name = name;
00551 
00552     double r = round(cap_channel<0xff>(c->r()));
00553     double g = round(cap_channel<0xff>(c->g()));
00554     double b = round(cap_channel<0xff>(c->b()));
00555     double a = cap_channel<1>   (c->a());
00556 
00557     // get color from given name (if one was given at all)
00558     if (name != "" && ctx && ctx->names_to_colors.count(name)) {
00559       Color* n = ctx->names_to_colors[name];
00560       r = round(cap_channel<0xff>(n->r()));
00561       g = round(cap_channel<0xff>(n->g()));
00562       b = round(cap_channel<0xff>(n->b()));
00563       a = cap_channel<1>   (n->a());
00564     }
00565     // otherwise get the possible resolved color name
00566     else {
00567       int numval = static_cast<int>(r) * 0x10000 + static_cast<int>(g) * 0x100 + static_cast<int>(b);
00568       if (ctx && ctx->colors_to_names.count(numval))
00569         res_name = ctx->colors_to_names[numval];
00570     }
00571 
00572     stringstream hexlet;
00573     hexlet << '#' << setw(1) << setfill('0');
00574     // create a short color hexlet if there is any need for it
00575     if (want_short && is_color_doublet(r, g, b) && a == 1) {
00576       hexlet << hex << setw(1) << (static_cast<unsigned long>(r) >> 4);
00577       hexlet << hex << setw(1) << (static_cast<unsigned long>(g) >> 4);
00578       hexlet << hex << setw(1) << (static_cast<unsigned long>(b) >> 4);
00579     } else {
00580       hexlet << hex << setw(2) << static_cast<unsigned long>(r);
00581       hexlet << hex << setw(2) << static_cast<unsigned long>(g);
00582       hexlet << hex << setw(2) << static_cast<unsigned long>(b);
00583     }
00584 
00585     if (want_short && !c->is_delayed()) name = "";
00586 
00587     // retain the originally specified color definition if unchanged
00588     if (name != "") {
00589       ss << name;
00590     }
00591     else if (r == 0 && g == 0 && b == 0 && a == 0) {
00592         ss << "transparent";
00593     }
00594     else if (a >= 1) {
00595       if (res_name != "") {
00596         if (want_short && hexlet.str().size() < res_name.size()) {
00597           ss << hexlet.str();
00598         } else {
00599           ss << res_name;
00600         }
00601       }
00602       else {
00603         ss << hexlet.str();
00604       }
00605     }
00606     else {
00607       ss << "rgba(";
00608       ss << static_cast<unsigned long>(r) << ",";
00609       if (output_style() != COMPRESSED) ss << " ";
00610       ss << static_cast<unsigned long>(g) << ",";
00611       if (output_style() != COMPRESSED) ss << " ";
00612       ss << static_cast<unsigned long>(b) << ",";
00613       if (output_style() != COMPRESSED) ss << " ";
00614       ss << a << ')';
00615     }
00616     append_token(ss.str(), c);
00617   }

00619   void Inspect::operator()(Boolean* b)

00624   void Inspect::operator()(String_Schema* ss)
00625   {
00626     // Evaluation should turn these into String_Constants, so this method is
00627     // only for inspection purposes.
00628     for (size_t i = 0, L = ss->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00629       if ((*ss)[i]->is_interpolant()) append_string("#{");
00630       (*ss)[i]->perform(this);
00631       if ((*ss)[i]->is_interpolant()) append_string("}");
00632     }
00633   }
00634 
00635   void Inspect::operator()(String_Constant* s)
00636   {
00637     if (String_Quoted* quoted = dynamic_cast<String_Quoted*>(s)) {
00638       return Inspect::operator()(quoted);
00639     }
00640     append_token(s->value(), s);
00641   }
00642 
00643   void Inspect::operator()(String_Quoted* s)
00644   {
00645     if (s->quote_mark()) {
00646       append_token(quote(s->value(), s->quote_mark(), true), s);
00647     } else {
00648       append_token(s->value(), s);
00649     }
00650   }

00652   void Inspect::operator()(Feature_Query* fq)
00653   {
00654     size_t i = 0;
00655     (*fq)[i++]->perform(this);
00656     for (size_t L = fq->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00657       (*fq)[i]->perform(this);
00658     }
00659   }
00660 
00661   void Inspect::operator()(Feature_Query_Condition* fqc)
00662   {
00663     if (fqc->operand() == Feature_Query_Condition::AND) {
00664       append_mandatory_space();
00665       append_token("and", fqc);
00666       append_mandatory_space();
00667     } else if (fqc->operand() == Feature_Query_Condition::OR) {
00668       append_mandatory_space();
00669       append_token("or", fqc);
00670       append_mandatory_space();
00671     } else if (fqc->operand() == Feature_Query_Condition::NOT) {
00672       append_mandatory_space();
00673       append_token("not", fqc);
00674       append_mandatory_space();
00675     }
00676 
00677     if (!fqc->is_root()) append_string("(");
00678 
00679     if (!fqc->length()) {
00680       fqc->feature()->perform(this);
00681       append_string(": "); // verified
00682       fqc->value()->perform(this);
00683     }
00684     for (size_t i = 0, L = fqc->length(); i < L; ++i)
00685       (*fqc)[i]->perform(this);
00686 
00687     if (!fqc->is_root()) append_string(")");
00688   }
00689 
00690   void Inspect::operator()(Media_Query* mq)
00691   {
00692     size_t i = 0;
00693     if (mq->media_type()) {
00694       if      (mq->is_negated())    append_string("not ");
00695       else if (mq->is_restricted()) append_string("only ");
00696       mq->media_type()->perform(this);
00697     }
00698     else {
00699       (*mq)[i++]->perform(this);
00700     }
00701     for (size_t L = mq->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00702       append_string(" and ");
00703       (*mq)[i]->perform(this);
00704     }
00705   }
00706 
00707   void Inspect::operator()(Media_Query_Expression* mqe)
00708   {
00709     if (mqe->is_interpolated()) {
00710       mqe->feature()->perform(this);
00711     }
00712     else {
00713       append_string("(");
00714       mqe->feature()->perform(this);
00715       if (mqe->value()) {
00716         append_string(": "); // verified
00717         mqe->value()->perform(this);
00718       }
00719       append_string(")");
00720     }
00721   }
00722 
00723   void Inspect::operator()(At_Root_Expression* ae)
00724   {
00725     if (ae->is_interpolated()) {
00726       ae->feature()->perform(this);
00727     }
00728     else {
00729       append_string("(");
00730       ae->feature()->perform(this);
00731       if (ae->value()) {
00732         append_colon_separator();
00733         ae->value()->perform(this);
00734       }
00735       append_string(")");
00736     }
00737   }
00738 
00739   void Inspect::operator()(Null* n)
00740   {
00741     append_token("null", n);
00742   }
00743 
00744   void Inspect::operator()(Parent_Selector* p)
00745   {
00746     if (p->selector()) {
00747       p->selector()->perform(this);
00748       append_delimiter();
00749     }
00750     else {
00751       append_string("&");
00752     }
00753   }
00754 
00755   // parameters and arguments
00756   void Inspect::operator()(Parameter* p)
00757   {
00758     append_token(p->name(), p);
00759     if (p->default_value()) {
00760       append_colon_separator();
00761       p->default_value()->perform(this);
00762     }
00763     else if (p->is_rest_parameter()) {
00764       append_string("...");
00765     }
00766   }
00767 
00768   void Inspect::operator()(Parameters* p)
00769   {
00770     append_string("(");
00771     if (!p->empty()) {
00772       (*p)[0]->perform(this);
00773       for (size_t i = 1, L = p->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00774         append_comma_separator();
00775         (*p)[i]->perform(this);
00776       }
00777     }
00778     append_string(")");
00779   }
00780 
00781   void Inspect::operator()(Argument* a)
00782   {
00783     if (!a->name().empty()) {
00784       append_token(a->name(), a);
00785       append_colon_separator();
00786     }
00787     // Special case: argument nulls can be ignored
00788     if (a->value()->concrete_type() == Expression::NULL_VAL) {
00789       return;
00790     }
00791     if (a->value()->concrete_type() == Expression::STRING) {
00792       String_Constant* s = static_cast<String_Constant*>(a->value());
00793       s->perform(this);
00794     } else a->value()->perform(this);
00795     if (a->is_rest_argument()) {
00796       append_string("...");
00797     }
00798   }
00799 
00800   void Inspect::operator()(Arguments* a)
00801   {
00802     append_string("(");
00803     if (!a->empty()) {
00804       (*a)[0]->perform(this);
00805       for (size_t i = 1, L = a->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00806         append_string(", "); // verified
00807         // Sass Bug? append_comma_separator();
00808         (*a)[i]->perform(this);
00809       }
00810     }
00811     append_string(")");
00812   }
00813 
00814   void Inspect::operator()(Selector_Schema* s)
00815   {
00816     s->contents()->perform(this);
00817   }
00818 
00819   void Inspect::operator()(Selector_Reference* ref)
00820   {
00821     if (ref->selector()) ref->selector()->perform(this);
00822     else                 append_string("&");
00823   }
00824 
00825   void Inspect::operator()(Selector_Placeholder* s)
00826   {
00827     append_token(s->name(), s);
00828     if (s->has_line_break()) append_optional_linefeed();
00829     if (s->has_line_break()) append_indentation();
00830 
00831   }
00832 
00833   void Inspect::operator()(Type_Selector* s)
00834   {
00835     append_token(s->name(), s);
00836   }
00837 
00838   void Inspect::operator()(Selector_Qualifier* s)
00839   {
00840     append_token(s->name(), s);
00841     if (s->has_line_break()) append_optional_linefeed();
00842     if (s->has_line_break()) append_indentation();
00843   }
00844 
00845   void Inspect::operator()(Attribute_Selector* s)
00846   {
00847     append_string("[");
00848     add_open_mapping(s);
00849     append_token(s->name(), s);
00850     if (!s->matcher().empty()) {
00851       append_string(s->matcher());
00852       if (s->value()) {
00853         s->value()->perform(this);
00854       }
00855     }
00856     add_close_mapping(s);
00857     append_string("]");
00858   }
00859 
00860   void Inspect::operator()(Pseudo_Selector* s)
00861   {
00862     append_token(s->name(), s);
00863     if (s->expression()) {
00864       s->expression()->perform(this);
00865       append_string(")");
00866     }
00867   }
00868 
00869   void Inspect::operator()(Wrapped_Selector* s)
00870   {
00871     bool was = in_wrapped;
00872     in_wrapped = true;
00873     append_token(s->name(), s);
00874     s->selector()->perform(this);
00875     append_string(")");
00876     in_wrapped = was;
00877   }
00878 
00879   void Inspect::operator()(Compound_Selector* s)
00880   {
00881     for (size_t i = 0, L = s->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00882       (*s)[i]->perform(this);
00883     }
00884     if (s->has_line_break()) {
00885       append_optional_linefeed();
00886     }
00887   }
00888 
00889   void Inspect::operator()(Complex_Selector* c)
00890   {
00891     Compound_Selector*           head = c->head();
00892     Complex_Selector*            tail = c->tail();
00893     Complex_Selector::Combinator comb = c->combinator();
00894     if (head && !head->is_empty_reference()) head->perform(this);
00895     bool is_empty = head && head->is_empty_reference();
00896     bool is_tail = head && !head->is_empty_reference() && tail;
00897     if (output_style() == COMPRESSED && comb != Complex_Selector::ANCESTOR_OF) scheduled_space = 0;
00898 
00899     switch (comb) {
00900       case Complex_Selector::ANCESTOR_OF:
00901         if (is_tail) append_mandatory_space();
00902       break;
00903       case Complex_Selector::PARENT_OF:
00904         append_optional_space();
00905         append_string(">");
00906         append_optional_space();
00907       break;
00908       case Complex_Selector::ADJACENT_TO:
00909         append_optional_space();
00910         append_string("+");
00911         append_optional_space();
00912       break;
00913       case Complex_Selector::PRECEDES:
00914         if (is_empty) append_optional_space();
00915         else append_mandatory_space();
00916         append_string("~");
00917         if (tail) append_mandatory_space();
00918         else append_optional_space();
00919       break;
00920     }
00921     if (tail && comb != Complex_Selector::ANCESTOR_OF) {
00922       if (c->has_line_break()) append_optional_linefeed();
00923     }
00924     if (tail) tail->perform(this);
00925   }
00926 
00927   void Inspect::operator()(Selector_List* g)
00928   {
00929     if (g->empty()) return;
00930     for (size_t i = 0, L = g->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00931       if (!in_wrapped && i == 0) append_indentation();
00932       (*g)[i]->perform(this);
00933       if (i < L - 1) {
00934         append_comma_separator();
00935         if ((*g)[i]->has_line_feed()) {
00936           append_optional_linefeed();
00937           append_indentation();
00938         }
00939       }
00940     }
00941   }
00942 
00943   void Inspect::fallback_impl(AST_Node* n)
00944   {
00945   }
